name: Running Blocks
description:
Running Blocks is a small project where you have to dodge boxes on a single path way. You must be careful not to fall off or collide with the boxes otherwise its back to the beginning. There's 4 levels in total.

Controls:

Arrow Keys or (AD) : Move the box Left or Right

ESC: To quit the game at any point

Music By Matthew Paolo (Check out more of his work here http://opengameart.org/users/matthewpablo)

This is the first project I finished and felt confident enough to post on a platform. Any feedback would be wonderful and greatly appricated
